summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 8, Randall's Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue; from East Union Street to East Spring Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105398 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
